trans-unit.source: Represents an execution loop in the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示在执行循环<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: DispatcherFrame objects typically fall into two categories: - Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherFrame 对象通常分为两类:-长时间运行的通用框架仅指示时该退出。

trans-unit.source: These frames should exit when they are requested.
trans-unit.target: 这些帧应在用户请求时退出。

trans-unit.source: - Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met.
trans-unit.target: -短时间运行的非常具体的帧该退出时满足一项重要标准。

trans-unit.source: These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met.
trans-unit.target: 考虑这些帧可能不以退出时在要求退出等待需满足其退出条件。

trans-unit.source: These frames should have a time-out associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 这些帧应该具有与它们关联的超时。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法不能将在此托管的类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref> class, by using the specified exit request flag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref>类中，使用指定的退出请求标志。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> typically fall into two categories: - Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>通常分为两类:-长时间运行，常规用途帧，退出仅指示时。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: These frames should exit when they are requested.
trans-unit.target: 这些帧应在用户请求时退出。

trans-unit.source: - Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met.
trans-unit.target: -短时间运行的非常具体的帧该退出时满足一项重要标准。

trans-unit.source: These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met.
trans-unit.target: 这些帧可以考虑在要求退出等待其退出条件得以满足时并不退出。

trans-unit.source: These frames should have a time-out associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 这些帧应该具有与它们关联的超时。

trans-unit.source: - - At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit.
trans-unit.target: -在应用程序关闭所有框架都都请求退出。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this frame will exit when all frames are requested to exit.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否所有帧都请求退出时，此帧将退出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref> should continue.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame"></xref>应继续。

trans-unit.source: Continue is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop.
trans-unit.target: 继续进行查询，在每个调度程序循环的顶部。

trans-unit.source: At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序关闭所有框架都都请求退出。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # 此类的 XAML 文本使用成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the frame should continue; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应继续帧;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
